title: React Instagram Clone
description: This application functions as an Instagram clone. A user can create an account by signing up, follow other users, upload posts, comment on posts, and see suggested users, as well as search for users.

title: React Movie API App
description: This application displays a carousel of movies, along with their trailers, pictures, and user reviews. The application also connects to a custom Spring boot API to interact with a MongoDB database containing the movie data.

title: Java Spring Boot Movie API
description: This is a Spring Boot API written in Java that connects to a MongoDB database containing movies. It is deployed using a Dockerfile

title: Angular Homes App
description: This is an Angular application that lists houses for rent and shows the details of individual houses.

title: React Quiz API App
description: This is a trivia quiz app made using React, and the Trivia API. It asks the user 20 trivia questions related to Computer Science.

title: JavaScript Calculator
description: Calculator App using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Bootstrap Portfolio Website
description: This is a Portfolio Website that I created using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.

title: Java College Enrollment Website
description: A web application that uses the MVC architecture, HTML, Java Server Pages, Java (Web Servlets), and SQL. The application connects to a database through a student ID and allows you to add or drop a course for that student using SQL queries.

title: JavaFX College Enrollment Application
description: A database application that uses Java and JavaFX, and SQL. The application connects to a database through a student ID and allows you to add or drop a course for that student using SQL queries.

title: PHP Movie List Application
description: A website created using HTML, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, CSV, and PHP. The site accesses a CSV file to get a list of movies comprised of their titles, directors, and release date and display them onto the page if a user selects them.
